disclaimer: The following response is provided as general architectural guidance and not professional advice. Please consult a licensed architect for detailed designs and local building norms.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious open area serving as the heart of the Bohemian studio apartment. Features include a mix of vintage decor, natural materials and a blend of functional seating arrangements.
rooms.vastu_note: Positioned in the southwest zone to promote prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern yet rustic kitchen with Bohemian decor and open shelves. Includes a central island for gathering.
rooms.vastu_note: Located in the southeast zone to enhance energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy retreat with Bohemian style, adorned with eclectic art and soft lighting. Features a king-size bed.
rooms.vastu_note: Placed in the northeast for positive energy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An integrated dining area adjacent to the kitchen. Features a communal table and comfortable seating.
rooms.vastu_note: Positioned in the central zone for harmony.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A separate room dedicated to servants with basic amenities and a small kitchenette. Maintains privacy while fostering a sense of community.
rooms.vastu_note: Placed in the west for security.

rooms.name: Studio Workspace
rooms.description: A dedicated creative space with ample natural light and storage solutions. Includes an easel area and flexible seating.
rooms.vastu_note: Located in the northwest to support creativity.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A welcoming entrance with a decorative archway, aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

openings.name: Window to Living Room
openings.location: North side of the living room wall
openings.description: Large windows providing natural light and ventilation. The positioning is optimal for a Bohemian aesthetic.

openings.name: Window to Master Bedroom
openings.description: Balcony-style window ensuring ample daylight and privacy.
